titled: First year of professional license in Software and Database Engineering
location: Ecole national d'informatique de Fianarantsoa - ENI
description: During this year, we were taught the fundamentals of computer science, such as mathematics, algorithms, and programming languages like C, Bash scripting, and JavaScript. At the end of the year, we had to complete a group project to be submitted to the institution in order to advance to the next level.

titled: Second year of professional license in Software and Database Engineering
location: Ecole national d'informatique de Fianarantsoa - ENI
description: The second year built upon the foundation laid in the first year of training. We delved deeper into algorithmics and programming languages such as C++, C#, Java, and PHP, while also beginning to learn about database management systems like MySQL and PostgreSQL. At the end of the year, I completed an internship and carried out a project.

For two months, I completed my internship as a developer intern. My main objective was to develop my professional skills, particularly in programming and professional relationships. I designed a web application for container terminal management using React.js, Node.js, and MySQL, allowing me to explore new technologies. In addition to this, I also worked on various office tasks and computer maintenance, as well as field tasks, thus demonstrating my versatility and ability to adapt to any situation.

titled: Third year of professional license in Software and Database Engineering
location: Ecole national d'informatique de Fianarantsoa - ENI
description: Bachelorâ€™s degree in Software Engineering and Databases.
For two intensive days, I participated in this training organized by ARONE Madagascar and received a certificate for my diligent participation.

titled: Full-stack developer at LAZ GLOBAL CORPORATION
description: During this internship, I enhanced my skills in full-stack development and gained valuable professional experience. I had the opportunity to work on enriching projects and take part in leading a team, which strengthened my leadership, communication, and project management abilities.
